SEARCH
Package State

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
State.GameState
public class GameState extends Object
Class that provides the implementation of the "catch the fox" game business logic. The class use List and integer, boolean data types. The class contains a logger. The logger logging only to the terminal.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameState()
    GameState constructor initialise the original states.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameState

      public GameState()
      GameState constructor initialise the original states. This is how the characters appear on the chess table when the game starts, or restarting.

  • Method Details

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition(int n)
      returns the position on the given index.
      Parameters:
      n - the index of the element we want to get back.
      Returns:
      the desired position.

    • validChoose

      public void validChoose(int row, int col, GameState position)
      checks if the player choose the character that belongs to its player base.
      Parameters:
      row - the clicked row.
      col - the clicked col.
      position - positions on the chess table.

    • performMove

      public GameState performMove(int row, int col, GameState position)
      performs the move if any neighbor cell is corresponding with the clicked cell, and if the move is valid. only diagonal neighbors are good.
      Parameters:
      row - the clicked row.
      col - the cliced col.
      position - list of positions to check is the neighbor cells are empty or not.
      Returns:
      returns the new positions to the controller.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty(int row, int col, int playerId)
      checks if the clicked cell is empty or not.
      Parameters:
      row - clicked row.
      col - clicked col.
      playerId - the player id who clicked 0 (dog) 1 (fox).
      Returns:
      returns true is the cell is empty, and false if the cell is not empty.

    • isGoalForFox

      public boolean isGoalForFox(GameState positions)
      checks if the positions are goal for fox.
      Parameters:
      positions - position list.
      Returns:
      returns true if the fox wins, false if the position is not goal for fox.

    • isGoalForDogs

      public boolean isGoalForDogs(GameState positions)
      checks if the positions are goal for dogs.
      Parameters:
      positions - position list.
      Returns:
      returns true if the dogs wins, false if the position is not goal for dogs.
